mapper.select: select m.membername, m.nickname, m.position, mt.authority, memberId from memberbyteam mt join member m using(memberid) where mt.teamname = #{teamName} and ((exitdate is null and mt.enrolldate <= to_date(last_day(#{currentDate}))) or (exitdate > to_date(#{currentDate}) and mt.enrolldate <= to_date(last_day(#{currentDate}))))
select teamName from memberbyteam where exitdate is null and memberid = #{memberId}
select authority from memberbyteam where exitdate is null and memberid = #{memberId}

select mh.inouttype, m.membername, m.nickname, mh.money, mh.content, mh.inoutdate from moneyhistory mh join member m using(memberid) where teamname = #{teamName} and inoutdate >= to_date(#{currentDate}) and inoutdate <= to_date(last_day(#{currentDate})) order by inoutdate desc
mapper.update: update teamoperationaccount set accountholder = #{accountHolder}, bankname = #{bankName}, accountnumber = #{accountNumber}, money = #{money} where teamname = #{teamName}
mapper.select: select * from match where teamhome = #{teamName} or teamaway = #{teamName} order by matchdate desc
mapper.update: update score set totalplaycount = totalplaycount + #{totalPlayCount}, win = win + #{win}, draw = draw + #{draw}, lose = lose + #{lose} where teamname = #{teamName}
update team set teamrating = teamrating + #{teamRating} where teamname = #{teamName}
update match set homescore = #{homeScore}, awayscore = #{awayScore}, result = 'Y' where matchno = #{matchNo}
mapper.select: select goalno, teamname, matchno, memberid, goaltime, b.membername from matchgoalresult join member b using(memberid) where matchno = #{matchNo} order by goaltime
select matchcontent from matchresultdetail where matchno = #{matchNo}
select membername, nickname, position, memberid, teamname from member m join mercenary mc using(memberid) where teamname = #{teamName} and mc.status = 'Y'
